about_the_game:
[/b]IMPORTANT NOTE
The purpouse of the DEMO is to showcase the main gameplay mechanics (normal mode).
With limited aircraft and characters selection.


After World War II, a large number of
ex-combatants with no place to go were recruited by
a mercenary army under the command of former General Albert Hessler,
a man without a nation and with only one objective … war.

In response to this, the United Nations through the SDU(Special Defense
Unit), creates a group under the name of VALKYRIAS.
This squad, made up of elite pilots, will have the
responsibility to stop Hessler’s ambitions.

FEATURES

Story mode
• Fight through 12 stages.
• Play Cooperative or Solo.
• 3 difficulty levels.
• Select between four (4) different pilots, each pilot have an unique introductory level.
• 9 aircrafts to Unlock and upgrade.

Game Mechanics
Rising Sun have four different type of game mechanics.

Normal Mode
Traditional Shoot 'em up mechanics.
Boss Mode
Battle against heavy armoured enemies.
Dogfight Mode
Shooter on rails mechanics.
Attack Mode
Flight to your objective evading enemy attacks.

[/b]IMPORTANT NOTE
The purpouse of the DEMO is to showcase the main gameplay mechanics (normal mode).
With limited aircraft and characters selection.


After World War II, a large number of
ex-combatants with no place to go were recruited by

a man without a nation and with only one objective … war.

In response to this, the United Nations through the SDU(Special Defense

This squad, made up of elite pilots, will have the
responsibility to stop Hessler’s ambitions.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD Ryzen 3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX560, Nvidia GTX1050ti or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 24.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470, AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX580, Nvidia GTX1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Rising Sun Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD Ryzen 3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX560, Nvidia GTX1050ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470, AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX580, Nvidia GTX1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: The Valkirias are here. Fast paced action Shoot 'em up with beautifully rendered 3D graphics. Select between four characters with different habilities and follow their story. Upgrade and unlock fighters, battle bosses and play amazing special stages, solo or with a friend.
supported_languages:
English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
